supervised_autodiff_pc.infer(model, image, ir=0.025, T=200, predictions_flow_upward=False, target_shape=None)

[summary]

Parameters

  • model ([type]) – [description]

  • image ([type]) – [description]

  • ir (float, optional) – [description], defaults to 0.025

  • T (int, optional) – [description], defaults to 200

  • predictions_flow_upward (bool, optional) – [description], defaults to False

  • target_shape ([type], optional) – [description], defaults to None
